INSTRUCTIONS: This form is to be completed by the clinician or other trained health professional, based on participant response. For additional clarification and examples, see UDS Coding Guidebook for Initial Visit Packet, Form B6. Select only one answer per question.
Select this box and enter "88" below for the Total GDS Score if and only if the participant: 1.) does not attempt the GDS, or 2.) answers fewer than 12 questions.
Is the subject able to complete the GDS, based on the clinician's best judgment?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Not able to complete the GDS

Field Label: Instruct the participant: "In the next part of this interview, I will ask you questions about your feelings. Some of the questions I will ask you may not apply, and some may make you feel uncomfortable. For each question, please answer "yes" or "no", depending on how you have been feeling in the past week, including today."
